channel.title: A little HELP PLEASE!

item.title: A little HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Ok well a guy told me how to add a random item…I’m adding barrows and working on the chest atm.


case 10284: 
{
int[]Amt = {4151,1050};
int X = (int)(Math.random()*amt.length);
		teleportToX = 2662;
		teleportToY = 2640;

}
break;

Would that be right…For adding either a santa or a whip to your inventory…It gives me an error though…Says can’t find symbol amt.

Read full topic
